1.SummaryEnglish: Queen's Blade Unlimited returns to the origin nine years ago, while simultaneously depicting a never-before-seen Queen's Blade world.

2.SummaryEnglish: Joōheika Gozenjiai" (Queen Contest) - The first volume of the Queen’s Blade Unlimited OVA series landed last year with a July 13th, 2018 debut where the DVD is priced at 6,000 yen and the Blu-ray at 7,000 yen. The second volume is set for a February 28th, 2020 debut in Japan and a new promotional video has come out for it. Mayu Kisaragi directing it based on the script by Ryuunosuke Kingetsu. Takayuki Noguchi is serving as the character designer and chief animation director with Fortes handling the animation production.
